title: Tom Brady reportedly "didn't want to" divorce Gisele Bündchen in 2022, as she now prepares for a baby with Joaquim Valente | NFL News - The Times of India
text: The NFL legend, Tom Brady, is now officially single as his ex wife, Gisele Bündchen, is all set to welcome a child with her new boyfriend, Joaquim Valente. Tom Brady divorced his ex wife after thirteen years of marriage back in 2022. But less than a year ago, a source had revealed to the Daily Mail. that Tom Brady actually did not divorce his ex wife because “co-parenting is hard”.Tom Brady Did Not Want A Divorce From Ex Wife Gisele Bundchenhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=85U-UxNbAXsIn March 2024, the source had said to Daily Mail, \"He never wanted to divorce, especially since his relationship with Bridget ended”. Tom Brady shares two children with Gisele and one son with his ex girlfriend, famous actress Bridget Moynahan, whom he had met before he met Gisele. The source added that Tom Brady was apprehensive of the whole co-parenting situation because it was “stressful” the last time. The source also added, “Tom would agree that co-parenting hasn't been easy. There has been a lot of love lost in their relationship, and navigating through that and their careers and finding new love has not been easy.”— noteableyfood (@noteableyfood) The source had also added that the NFL legend, Tom Brady and his ex wife, Gisele Bündchen, “never expected to break up”.After Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen’s divorce was finalised in October 2022, the path was not all that rosy for them. Many accused Gisele of being a “gold digger” and she had a pretty tough time dealing with her separation. The once most loved couple, Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen were now in the eye of the storm. Tom Brady’s Ex Wife Gisele Bundchen Was Accused Of Being A CheaterBut Gisele Bündchen did manage to move on and found love in another man - her jiu-jitsu instructor, Joaquim Valente. In October 2023, the two began dating each other but soon after they found themselves in the middle of a controversy as many accused Gisele Bündchen of cheating on Tom Brady with her new boyfriend.When Netlfix released “The Roast Of Tom Brady” in 2024, many jokes were made about Gisele Bündchen’s new relationship. Hollywood actor and famous comedians Kevin Hart and Nikki Glaser made multiple jokes about Tom Brady’s failed marriage and his ex wife’s new relationship.— _MLFootball (@_MLFootball) This did not go down very well with Tom Brady’s ex wife, Gisele Bündchen and as per People, she was “deeply hurt” by the jokes that were made at her expense on The Roast Of Tom Brady. As per U.S. Weekly, Tom Brady even had to apologise to Gisele Bündchen to make matters right since it involved their two children.Gisele Bündchen had also broken up with her boyfriend for some time after the roast. But they got back soon after and in October 2024, the two announced they are welcoming a child soon.Also Read: Tyreek Hill's wife, Keeta Vaccaro, and her mom stir drama with remarks about breastfeeding and athletes' girlfriends amid Tyreek's kids with multiple women
